p: The review article “Solid lipid nanoparticles for drug delivery: pharmacological and biopharmaceutical aspects” provides a literature survey on original publications from the last 7 years, considering only those articles where pharmacodynamic and/or pharmacokinetic studies have been performed. The article focuses on biopharmaceutical aspects of nanosystems administered through different routes, from oral absorption to enhanced brain penetration, including a critical view on current uncertainties and future directions.
